snippet: A rufous hummingbird that appeared outside the American Museum of Natural History was spotted again.
abstract: A rufous hummingbird that appeared outside the American Museum of Natural History was spotted again.
lead_paragraph: Like a hit holiday revue whose run has been extended into the new year, the rufous hummingbird who showed up outside the American Museum of Natural History last month has delayed her journey southward and was seen "feeding rather vigorously" Thursday morning on Mahonia japonica flowers, recent frigid weather notwithstanding.

headline.main: A Little Visitor Hovers Awhile Longer
